ticket.title: fix snowman test helper to include _method only on non-GET or non-POST
ticket.original-body:
Writing a test for a search_field related bug recently (5730), turned out to be slightly harder than usual since the expected resulted included a _method = 'get' within the snowman method.
I've included a patch to ensure that the _method only outputs for non-GET or non-POST queries. (i thought perhaps it better to check non-GET and non-POST rather than PUT or DELETE since in the future perhaps we might support other verbs (RESTfulie?) in the snowman.
I've also modified my test to actually work as a "method" get, since it was a search form.
Basically this patch fixes the test helpers to ensure "whole_form" and "snowman" can be used correctly in tests.
ticket.latest-body:
Writing a test for a search_field related bug recently (5730), turned out to be slightly harder than usual since the expected resulted included a _method = 'get' within the snowman method.
I've included a patch to ensure that the _method only outputs for non-GET or non-POST queries. (i thought perhaps it better to check non-GET and non-POST rather than PUT or DELETE since in the future perhaps we might support other verbs (RESTfulie?) in the snowman.
I've also modified my test to actually work as a "method" get, since it was a search form.
Basically this patch fixes the test helpers to ensure "whole_form" and "snowman" can be used correctly in tests.
ticket.original-body-html:
Writing a test for a search_field related bug recently (5730), turned out to be slightly harder than usual since the expected resulted included a _method = 'get' within the snowman method.

I've included a patch to ensure that the _method only outputs for non-GET or non-POST queries. (i thought perhaps it better to check non-GET and non-POST rather than PUT or DELETE since in the future perhaps we might support other verbs (RESTfulie?) in the snowman.

I've also modified my test to actually work as a "method" get, since it was a search form.

Basically this patch fixes the test helpers to ensure "whole_form" and "snowman" can be used correctly in tests.

version.body:
Writing a test for a search_field related bug recently (5730), turned out to be slightly harder than usual since the expected resulted included a _method = 'get' within the snowman method.
I've included a patch to ensure that the _method only outputs for non-GET or non-POST queries. (i thought perhaps it better to check non-GET and non-POST rather than PUT or DELETE since in the future perhaps we might support other verbs (RESTfulie?) in the snowman.
I've also modified my test to actually work as a "method" get, since it was a search form.
Basically this patch fixes the test helpers to ensure "whole_form" and "snowman" can be used correctly in tests.
version.body-html:
Writing a test for a search_field related bug recently (5730), turned out to be slightly harder than usual since the expected resulted included a _method = 'get' within the snowman method.

I've included a patch to ensure that the _method only outputs for non-GET or non-POST queries. (i thought perhaps it better to check non-GET and non-POST rather than PUT or DELETE since in the future perhaps we might support other verbs (RESTfulie?) in the snowman.

I've also modified my test to actually work as a "method" get, since it was a search form.

Basically this patch fixes the test helpers to ensure "whole_form" and "snowman" can be used correctly in tests.

version.title: [PATCH] fix snowman test helper to include _method only on non-GET or non-POST

version.body: To be clearer, when writing tests, using whole_form and snowman helpers methods led to incorrect expected text. Those helpers do not handle "get" method forms very well which is what this patch fixes. <%= form_for(@post, :url => search_posts_path, :html => {:method => :get}) do |f| %> <%= f.search_field(:title) %> <% end %> was resulting in the snowman function putting a hidden parameter for "_method" with value = "get" which is wrong. The form_text was also hard-coded to always put the method in the form as "post".
version.body-html:
To be clearer, when writing tests, using whole_form and snowman helpers methods led to incorrect expected text. Those helpers do not handle "get" method forms very well which is what this patch fixes.

<%= form_for(@post, :url => search_posts_path, :html => {:method => :get}) do |f| %>

{mkd-extraction-27744e020310fe464731a5d317065098}

<% end %>

was resulting in the snowman function putting a hidden parameter for "_method" with value = "get" which is wrong. The form_text was also hard-coded to always put the method in the form as "post".
version.title: [PATCH] fix snowman test helper to include _method only on non-GET or non-POST

version.body: In 1977, Asics Shoes merged with GTO and Jelenka to form Onitsuka Tiger . Despite the name change, a range of vintage Asics Onitsuka Tiger shoes from asics onitsuka are still produced and sold internationally under the brand Asics Running Shoes clearance Business Name The name of the company “Cheap Asics Running Shoes” is an acronym for the Latin phrase “anima sana in corpore sano” which translates to “a healthy mind in healthy body” , which is derived from the aphorism mens sana in corpore sano. Since 2007 there has been greater emphasis placed on this acronym. Asics Mexico Shoes is a Japanese company athletic team. Asics Gel Kinsei 2 Asics Gel Kinsei Asics Kinsei 2 Kinsei 2 Asics Asics Gel Kinsei 2 Running Shoes Asics Mexico 66 Asics Tiger Mexico 66 Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 Asics Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66

version.body: As far as Adidas Jeremy Scott is concerned, Jeremy Scott has already earned his 3 stripes. JS isn’t afraid to push the envelope, and his Adidas Jeremy Scott Wings Originals by Originals (ObyO) collection is always a hit, so adidas allowed him to design a new collection for Spring/Summer 2010. The Adidas Jeremy Scott 2010 people’s favorite “JS Wings” sneaker returns as well as a few new models. Also, included in the adidas JS collection is a Adidas Jeremy Scott Collection wild selection of apparel that can only be pulled off by the brave. Look for the first adidas JS delivery in February 2010, and the Adidas Jeremy Scott Buy second drop will follow in March. Jeremy Scott and adidas just released a new colorway of the 3 Tongues Attitude. The 3 Tongues Attitude isn’t as fly as the Louis Vuitton Stephen Sprouse or as cute as the Teddy Bears, but like all Jeremy Scott adidas product, these new kicks will vanish quickly. The new Louis Vuitton Stephen Sprouse Collection Tongues Attitude comes is the most simple colorway known to man, white/black. You can find the new Louis Vuitton Stephen Sprouse Sneakers Tongues Attitude sneaker at Proper and at select adidas Originals retailers. Nike Lebron James Lebron James Shoes Nike Zoom Lebron

version.body: Using the "patch" tag instead of prefixing the ticket title with "[PATCH]" to make sure patched tickets end up in the [open patches bin](https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets/bins/5805). :)
